description: The Sunny package is an existing open source software to support the simulation of magnetic spin systems. It is available online under the MIT license here: https://github.com/SunnySuite/Sunny.jl The package aims to include the following features: - Analysis for symmetry-allowed interactions - Monte Carlo algorithms for simulating equilibrium configurations. - Schemes for integrating spin dynamics. - Inference of model Hamiltonians - Support for generalized SU(N) spins - Tools for interpreting experimental data, such as diffraction data, magnetization curves, and heat capacity data
name: Contributing to Sunny open source code
